creator: vlsergey@gmail.com
text:
Word95 SPRM codes seems to be different from Word97. New SPRM compressors/decompressors need to be implemented for old version of Word.

May be for Word 2.x as well.

creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: There are currently no plans to invest time to support such old formats unless someone comes up with well-tested patches.
